StubblePyomo module¶

author: young

StubblePyomo.f_con_stubble_bcd()¶

Links the consumption of a given category with the provision of another category or the transfer of stubble to the following period. Eg category A consumption provides category B. Category B can either be consumed (hence providing cat C) or transferred to the following period.

StubblePyomo.stub_precalcs(params, report)¶

Call crop precalc functions.

Parameters

  • params – dictionary which stores all arrays used to populate pyomo parameters.

  • report – dictionary which stores all report values.

StubblePyomo.stubble_me(model, v, f)¶

Calculate the total energy provided to each ev pool by feed the selected amount of stubble.

Used in global constraint (con_me). See CorePyomo

StubblePyomo.stubble_req_a(model, k, s)¶

Calculate the total stubble required to consume the selected volume category A stubble in each period.

Used in global constraint (con_stubble_a). See CorePyomo

StubblePyomo.stubble_vol(model, v, f)¶

Calculate the total volume required by each ev pool to feed the selected amount of stubble.

Used in global constraint (con_vol). See CorePyomo

StubblePyomo.stubpyomo_local(params)¶

Builds pyomo variables, parameters and constraints

Australian Farm Optimisation Model
